title: NFL Season Kicks Off
teaser: Sports analyst Mike Pesca joins us to talk about the Washington team's name, Michael Sam and who we should be watching this season.
contentencoded:
As the NFL season begins, Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca discusses some of the main questions with host Robin Young: Will Daniel Snyder, owner of the Washington Redskins, ever change the team name? Will Michael Sam, the first openly gay player drafted by an NFL team, be a frequent player? And who should we be watching this season?

  • See more sports segments with Mike Pesca

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s The Gist podcast. He tweets @pescami.
